oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Politische "Grenzgänger" in der Viersektorenstadt Berlin (1945 - 1948) Überlegungen zu einer historischen Quellenkritik der Autobiografie
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schlegelmilch, Arthur
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Autobiographie
Quellenkritik
Ost-West Spaltung
Berlin
Kalter Krieg
Autobiography
Source Analysis
Cold War
East-West Division
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The article aims to develop criteria that can be helpful for the historical contextualization of sources which are helpful for autobiographical research. It focuses on "political border-crossers" in Berlin. These people resufsed to accept the separation of East and West and the consequences of the Cold War. They looked - unsuccessfully in the end - for political alternatives to the formation of ideological camps and the separation of states and cities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Moving the Social; Vol. 45 (2011): Biografische Ansätze zur Geschichte der Arbeiterbewegung im 20. Jahrhundert; 51-72
